How To Redeem Codes In Alien Invasion

New players of this game may be wondering how they can enter these game codes to receive all of the great rewards. Below is a step-by-step process.

  2. Players must then locate the redeem codes section and input their active code to receive the rewards.
  3. Once the code has been entered and activated, players can enjoy all of their in-game rewards.

What Codes Do In This Game?

The codes in Alien Invasion will give players a variety of special gifts like gems and free spins which can be used to buy additional features in the game.
